channel.title: Systems Modeling on Erick C. Jones Jr.
channel.description: Recent content in Systems Modeling on Erick C. Jones Jr.

item.title: Sim CCS City
item.description: Background I extended the work of (Wu and Plantinga 2003) using R and certain equation modififications to investigate how the addition of a light rail line would influence a city. Cities have housed most of the human race since 2004 and as a result influence most of the individual, commercial, and industrial energy and GHG patterns. However, city designs, have placed amenities in isolated suburban pockets, the abundance of roads have encouraged sprawl, and zoning laws have discouraged density.

item.title: Monocentric City Modeling
item.description: I extended the work of (Wu and Plantinga 2003) using R and certain equation modifications to investigate how the addition of a light rail line would influence a city. Cities have housed most of the human race since 2004 and as a result influence most of the individual, commercial, and industrial energy and GHG patterns. However, city designs, have placed amenities in isolated suburban pockets, the abundance of roads have encouraged sprawl, and zoning laws have discouraged density.
